equipment.name: Sovereign Mail
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>6.96</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>135</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Golem</text> has a <text class='c_random'>6.93%</text> chance to reduce its active Cooldown by <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds and a <text class='c_random'>1.5</text> chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

equipment.name: Sovereign Helm
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.

equipment.name: Ritual Dagger
base_affixes: Distant enemies have a <text class='c_number'>12%</text> chance to be Stunned for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds when they hit you. You deal <text class='c_random'>28.59%</text> increased damage to Stunned enemies.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +8.25% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites
+7.5% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging enemies with <text class='c_important'>Sever</text> has a <text class='c_random'>19.32%</text> chance to spawn a pool of <text class='c_important'>Blight</text> under the target that deals <text class='c_random'>77.26%</text> bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a <text class='c_number'>10%</text> chance to generate <text class='c_random'>41.69</text> Essence when hitting a <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> enemy.

equipment.name: Boneweave Gauntlets
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>41.97%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
base_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.53%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>92.04%</text>.
+19.6% Damage for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
base_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>2.8</text>.

equipment.name: Jade Relic
strikethrough_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>25.62%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>24.32%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>48.64%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Amulet
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>34.65%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
4.5% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
+(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Death's Reach Passive

equipment.name: Ring
base_affixes: +9.5% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
+0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
strikethrough_affixes: While <text class='c_important'>Army of the Dead</text> is active, your Minions gain <text class='c_random'>92.81%</text> Attack Speed and take <text class='c_number'>90%</text> reduced damage.
added_affixes: Restore <text class='c_random'>3</text> of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.
